videos.description: Kentucky's Edrice Adebayo shows his strength by spinning off the defender and then going for the two-handed dunk and the foul.
videos.headline: Adebayo goes strong for dunk and-1

videos.description: Miles Bridges continues his dunking tour across America with a sweet crossover dribble to get the baseline and then throws down a huge two-hand jam for Michigan State.
videos.headline: Bridges' sweet crossover ends with monster dunk

videos.description: 1H (0:02) UK Isaiah Briscoe made Layup. Assisted by Dominique Hawkins.
videos.headline: I. Briscoe made Layup. Assisted by D. Hawkins.

videos.description: Kentucky head coach John Calipari on what went well and what went wrong in the first half
videos.headline: Kentucky head coach John Calipari on what went well and what went wrong in the first half

videos.description: 2H (15:58) UK Malik Monk made Three Point Jumper. Assisted by De'Aaron Fox.
videos.headline: M. Monk made Three Point Jumper. Assisted by D. Fox.
Isaiah Briscoe draws a foul and makes the jumper

videos.description: 2H (4:36) UK Malik Monk made Three Point Jumper. Assisted by Derek Willis.
videos.headline: Malik Monk hits his 7th three pointer of the night

videos.description: Malik Monk steals the show against Michigan State by finishing 7-11 from 3-point range for Kentucky.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCB Highlight (Monk rains 3's against Michigan State) 2016/11/15

videos.headline: Monk rains 3's against Michigan State
